text: Just because I don’t care doesn’t mean I don’t understand.
author: Homer Simpson

text: At this moment, there are 6,470,818,671 people in the world... and sometimes all you need is one.
author: Peyton Sawyer

text: I live in two worlds, one is a world of books.
author: Rory Gilmore

text: Kids, you tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.
author: Homer Simpson
